title: 483 27 "Looking for the Answer! Fire Fist Ace Dies on the Battlefield!"Transliteration: "Kotae o Sagashite – Hiken no Ēsu Senjō ni Shisu" (Japanese:答えを探して 火拳のエース戦場に死す) Hiroaki Miyamoto Hirohiko Kamisaka January 16, 2011(2011-01-16)[232]
